content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good to meet you, Juan. What rental price are you interested in for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the minimum rental price possible.

If I agree to the price, I would like to rent the apartment for at least 1 year.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand. The minimum rental price possible for this apartment is 1,200 Euros per month. If you agree to this price, I would be happy to rent the apartment to you for a minimum of 1 year.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month.

Can you confirm that I will be able to rent the apartment for at least 1 year?

Also, I would like to know if there are any additional fees or expenses that I should be aware of.

Lastly, is there anything else that I need to do to complete the rental process?

Thank you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Of course, Juan. I can confirm that you will be able to rent the apartment for at least 1 year.

There are no additional fees or expenses associated with renting this apartment.

To complete the rental process, you will need to sign a lease agreement and provide a security deposit. Once these are in place, you will be able to move into the apartment.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
